ygData.subject: Excellent Shadowknight website
ygData.msgSnippet: The Soerbaird Guild, who host the ever popular The Shaman s Crucible, have put up The Knight Watch, a Shadow Knight page.  It contains spell descriptions all
ygData.messageBody:
The Soerbaird Guild, who host the ever popular The Shaman's Crucible,
have put up The Knight Watch, a Shadow Knight page. It contains
spell descriptions all the way to 49, spell analysis, guides, and
forums for discussion. Eventually, all classes will be represented,
but for now you can view the Shadow Knight, Shaman, and Wizard sites.
(Rangers will be up soon, a merger of The Ranger's Glade and
Soerbaird.com)

Please come, contribute what you will, and see what we have to offer.

The Knight Watch
http://www.soerbaird.com/shadowknight
The main Soerbaird page:
http://www.soerbaird.com

Xilith T'Vyn
Tunare
